DataElement.preferredName: FSFI 19 Past 4 Weeks Level Discomfort or Pain During or Following Vaginal Penetration Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated rating in the past 4 weeks of their level (degree) of discomfort or pain during or following vaginal penetration, using a 6 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Female Sexual Function Index Past 4 Weeks Level of Discomfort or Pain During or Following Vaginal Penetration Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 19-item self-report questionnaire designed to measure sexual function in women. It was developed for assessing domains of sexual functioning (e.g. sexual arousal, orgasm, satisfaction, pain) in women participating in clinical trials for arousal disorders._A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present._A question about the level or degree of discomfort or pain an individual has experienced during or following vaginal penetration._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 19-item self-report questionnaire designed to measure sexual function in women. It was developed for assessing domains of sexual functioning (e.g. sexual arousal, orgasm, satisfaction, pain) in women participating in clinical trials for arousal disorders.

Concepts.definition: A 19-item self-report questionnaire designed to measure sexual function in women. It was developed for assessing domains of sexual functioning (e.g. sexual arousal, orgasm, satisfaction, pain) in women participating in clinical trials for arousal disorders.

Concepts.longName: Level of Discomfort or Pain During or Following Vaginal Penetration
Concepts.definition: A question about the level or degree of discomfort or pain an individual has experienced during or following vaginal penetration.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Over the past 4 weeks, how wo
ReferenceDocuments.description: Over the past 4 weeks, how would you rate your level (degree) of discomfort or pain during or following vaginal penetration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Scoring Manual Link
ReferenceDocuments.description: The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure.
